é‡‘å¥

  • â€œNothing seems fundamentally so hard that it couldn't be solved by the smartest people in the world working incredibly hard for the next five years.â€
  • â€œFor the first time, opportunity is massively available for everyone.â€
  • â€œThe age of solo entrepreneurship powered by AI is here.â€
  • â€œBut the path to full automation is messier than the hype suggests.â€
  • â€œI don't think LLMs, as they can understand, are on the way to AGI. And my definition for AGI is, I think, the old school RL definition, which is a machine that can go into any environment and learn efficiently.â€
  • â€œIt feels like we're in a brute force type of regime, but maybe that's fine.â€
  • â€œBasic research is different, right? Like trying to get into the fundamentals, as opposed to like there's a lot of industry research like how do we make these things more useful in order to generate profit.â€
  • â€œYou gotta wait until the current people retire and have a chance at changing the paradigm.â€
  • â€œI think a lot of what's holding back the models these days is not actually intelligence. It's getting the right context into the model so that it can be able to use its intelligence.â€
  • â€œThe economy is going to naturally value whatever the AI can't do.â€
  • â€œUnless we're gonna create human humans, unless AI is actually embodied in human experience, then humans will always be the generators of ideas in the economy.â€
  • â€œThe sovereign individual framework might be the best lens for understanding AI's economic and political impact.â€
  • â€œI think network effects are playing much less of a role now than they did in the web two era.â€
  • â€œEveryone read the book [The Innovator's Dilemma] and that changes what the theory even means.â€
  • â€œI think Karpathy recently said that it's going to be the decade of agents. And I think that's absolutely right.â€
  • â€œI think we're in an era of Silicon Valley where it's like very, very get rich driven and that makes me a little sad.â€
  • â€œI think there's a huge field of study there that is not being studied.â€
